definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pour, flow, run (Aram. ngar be long (of time), Aph. prolong, potract; [[נְגַר]] endure, flow, stream);—
be poured, spilt, 2Sa 14:14 ([[כַּמַּיִם]] [[מֻגׇּרִים אַרְחָה]] in sim. of mortality).
pour oneself, flow, trickle, of eye (in tears) La 3:49.
be stretched out (?) [[לַיְלָה נִגְּרָה]] Ps 77:3 (or rd. [[עֵינִי]] ?).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהִגַּרְתִּ֫י]] Mic 1:6; Impf. [[וַיַּגֵּר]] Ps 75:9; [[וַתַּגֵּר]] Ez Eze 35:5; [[יַגִּירֻ֫הוּ]] Ps 63:11; Imv. sf. [[הַגִּרֵם]] Je 18:21; —pour down, hurl down the stones of Samaria, subj. ´[[י]] Mic 1:6; pour out, fig. of ´[[י]]'s wine-cup, Ps 75:9; sq. [[עַל־יְדֵי]] [[חֶ֫רֶב]] = deliver over to Je 18:21, Ps 63:11, Ez Eze 35:5.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[כְּמַיִם מֻגׇּרִים בְּמוֹרָד]] Mic 1:4 (in sim., of mountains melting at theophany.
